product_name: The North Face Burst Rock Rain Jacket - Women's
long_description: Forget about bulky shells that slow you down. Pack the women's Burst Rock jacket from The North Face for an athletic alternative that still provides weatherproof coverage. Hyvent(R) 2.5L waterproofing and sealed seams keep out rain and wind while remaining breathable. 4-way stretch nylon blend allows for a closer, more athletic fit perfect for alpine climbing or aerobic activity in cold weather. Close-fitting hood can be customized using hidden drawcords. 2 zippered front pockets secure small valuables and can also be used for venting when unzipped. 1 internal security pocket stores small essentials. The North Face Burst Rock jacket features adjustable cuffs and hem cinch cord so you can seal in warmth.
short_description: Forget about bulky shells that slow you down. Pack the women's Burst Rock jacket from The North Face for an athletic alternative that still provides weatherproof coverage.
